Review_Text: I love how real it is. Ravi and his guests are funny, open and real. When the fourth episode ended I was actually disappointed there wasn't another one to watch. Great show!!
Love how charming and smart Ravi is. Love that he entertains while making us think!
There's a lot of heart in this series. I really enjoyed everything about it. Hoping for more episodes soon!

I believe the show is perfectly titled, Ravi indulges in a lot of great questions about life and his true passions that I've also contemplated myself. Really great progression through the episodes, there's something for everyone. Once you start, it's hard to stop watching them all, I hope there will be another season.

Review_title: Great show, would love to see more!!
Review_Text: Really enjoyed the commentary and information shared on this show. Ravi as a host is very relatable and engaging which brings an additional level of charm to this wonderful show. It's nice to see something hopeful and uplifting on TV these days. I wish there were more episodes, can't wait for the next season.
Real, relatable, fun. Great job, Ravi!!! It is so human and heart wrenching! More, please more!

Review_title: Great show with heart, charm, and great destinations!
Review_Text: Such a fun and heartfelt show. I know it's not about food, but Ravi's ability to connect with people and find the humanity in everyday moments feels a lot like No Reservations. The show is very compelling and charming to watch. Looking forward to seeing more episodes - didn't want it to end!
